alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 8:31PM MST until January 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. Blowing and drifting of snow is possible along the east slopes of the Sangre de Cristo mountains.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands
